p: The polyphenolic standards (gallic acid, hydrated quercetin-3-rutinoside), H 2O 2, ABTS peroxidase and trolox were provided by Sigma-Aldrich (Berlin, Germany). The reagents (Folin-Ciocalteu, aluminium trichloride, acetate of sodium) were provided by Sigma-Aldrich (Berlin, Germany), and the other solvents were obtained from Panreac (Barcelona, Spain), and Lab-Scan (Warsaw, Poland).
